title: buying championship riven account for paypal
body: add me on skype lordriven69, ill go first or if u live in sydney we can meet up and do cash in hand

replies.body: arent you that kid who just got scammed out of 100 bucks for trying to buy a skin? looks like you didnt learn your lesson....
